aws_guardduty_member.description: Provides a resource to manage a GuardDuty member

account_id.description: AWS account ID for member account.

detector_id.description: The detector ID of the GuardDuty account where you want to create member accounts.

invite.description: Boolean whether to invite the account to GuardDuty as a member. Defaults to `false`. To detect if an invitation needs to be (re-)sent, the Terraform state value is `true` based on a `relationship_status` of `Disabled`, `Enabled`, `Invited`, or `EmailVerificationInProgress`.

disable_email_notification.description: Boolean whether an email notification is sent to the accounts. Defaults to `false`.

id.description: The ID of the GuardDuty member

relationship_status.description: The status of the relationship between the member account and its master account. More information can be found in [Amazon GuardDuty API Reference](https://docs.aws.amazon.com/guardduty/latest/ug/get-members.html).
